document_data.mainbody:
Quynn Goldengrove was a prince of the Suldusk tribes of wild elves in the Forest of Tethir who married a half-elf woman from Clan Ithal.
Prince Quynn married Varytha Ithal, the daughter of human chieftain Corin Ithal and this elven wife Shyllisyrr Ithal.
In , Shyllisyrrs accidental death lead to fragile relations between the Tethyrian clans the tribes of the Forest of Tethir, which lasted for over a decade. Quynns decision to marry a woman from Clan Ithal played an important role in easing tensions between the two peoples and restoring peace.
